cards.basicText: If Darth Maul has less health than your opponent, play this card and gain 4 health. He may look at the top 4 cards in his deck and take 2 cards into his hand.
cards.title: kenobiiiiiiiiiiii!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

cards.basicText: When played, Savage and Maul gain 2 health and may take 1 card from their discard pile into their hand.
cards.title: Son of dathomir

cards.basicText: The opponent must reveal their hand. Maul may discard 1 card or discard 2 from their deck into the discard pile.
cards.title: Your mind will speak Or it will break

cards.basicText: If Maul and Savage are in the same zone their attacks have +2 damage for this turn.
cards.title: the dark side has never been stronger

cards.immediateText: Cancel all abilities on your opponents card.
cards.title: feint

cards.afterText: If combat is won, chose a card from your opponent's hand to discard.
cards.title: only the strongest shall rule

cards.afterText: If combat is won, move 2 spaces.
cards.title: One last lesson

cards.afterText: Maul may absorb up to 2 health from Savage's health.
cards.immediateText: +1 attack if only Maul moves or if only Savage moves.
cards.title: not as your brother, but as your master

cards.immediateText: If Maul is enraged, add the boost value to Savage's attack total.
cards.title: I hate you!!!!

cards.immediateText: iIf Maul and Savage are adjacent to each other add +2 Defense/Attack to this card.
cards.title: Brothers

cards.afterText: Take one card from your discard pile into your hand.
cards.duringText: If Maul or Savage are out numbered in the zone this cards value is 5.
cards.title: Duel of the fates
at last we will reveAL OURSELVES

cards.immediateText: If Savage is killed the boost value of this card is added to Mauls total attack.
cards.title: what fun..... what fun. formerly darth. now just maul.

cards.afterText: If you won the combat you may deal +2 damage or you may add the boost value of this card to the health of Savage or Mau.l
cards.title: don't be so certain

cards.immediateText: If the opponent doesn't have allies in the combat zone this card's value increases to 5.
cards.title: fear is my ally

hero.name: darth maul
hero.specialAbility:
If Maul has less than 10 health he flips his rage token, add +2 attack to all his cards. 

If Savage is dead and Maul has less than 8 health, Maul gains an additional action.
